title: Around Sound Pro v2.10 Final By bobiras2009
description:
By bobiras2009



 Around Sound Pro allows you to listen to music and still be aware of your surroundings.
What it does:
*PRO Version ONLY* Street Mode:Ã¢â‚¬Â¨
+Walk down the street and only hear the noises above the set trigger level. Never interrupts your music.
Pause Music Mode:Ã¢â‚¬Â¨

+Uses your headset's microphone to listen for loud noises and pause your music if one is detected, then play back the sound that triggered the pause and continues for a short period of time the optionally resumes your music.

Where would I use it?Ã¢â‚¬Â¨Ã¢â‚¬Â¨
At the office: pause your music automatically when someone is trying to get your attention
At home: Don't miss door slams, children crying, your dog barking, or other warning signsÃ¢â‚¬Â¨Ã¢â‚¬Â¨
At the airport: Relax at the gate and have your music pause when the gate announcements startÃ¢â‚¬Â¨Ã¢â‚¬Â¨
Anywhere relatively quiet where you want to know if something happens around you


What's in this version: (Updated : Aug 21, 2012)

    New: Use with games! Non-pause mode works best. Request your favorite game to support Around Sound's Pause Mode!
    New Timeout Options: Adjust timeout duration and volume - Pro or Timeout Options Upgrade needed.
    Fixed swipeable-ness (real word?..) of the sound meter trigger adjustment so it doesn't move the whole tab
    V2.07: Bug Fixes

Required Android O/S : 2.2+



                                  By bobiras2009
